deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title User Contract
 @notice This contract represents a user's profile, storing certified certificates and encrypted view codes.
@notice Modifier to restrict functions to the contract owner.
@notice Initializes the User contract and sets the contract owner.

@notice Gets the contract owner address
 @return The address of the contract owner

addCertificate(address).details: Reverts if the certificate already exists.

params._certificate: The address of the certificate to add.

addCertifiedCertificate(address).details: Reverts if the certificate is already certified.

params._certificate: The address of the certificate to certify.

returns._0: The address of the contract owner

addCertificate(address).notice: Adds a certificate to the general list.

addCertifiedCertificate(address).notice: Adds a certificate to the certified list.

constructor.notice: Initializes the User contract and sets the contract owner.

userdoc.notice: This contract represents a user's profile, storing certified certificates and encrypted view codes.
